Very interesting article on video marketing!!

How to Determine the Efficacy of B2B Video Campaigns - Analysis paralysis is a real challenge many B2B marketers face when evaluating their video campaigns. With so many different data points available, how do you know if you have a winner on your hands?
In this post, we look at five common B2B video marketing goals, and use real world examples to illustrate how to use different metrics to evaluate their success. Read more...

Elements of Great Video Editing - Video can be mesmerizing and memorable — or it can be generic and forgettable. And, contrary to popular belief, it often has to do more with the editing than anything else. Though editing can’t always save a bad production, it is what turns a “good” production into a “great” one. Editing is what turns raw footage into a creative, well-polished narrative. Though it often takes experience in editing to get better at it, there are many things that even beginners can consider when trying to become a great video editor. Read more...

summary: I specialize in helping business owners and decision makers in marketing, advertising, safety, training, corporate communications, human resource and public relations departments share their message, leverage their time, and increase sales and ROI using video and video marketing.D-Mak Productions is a Phoenix, Arizona based video production company specializing in producing corporate, commercial, digital and branded media content. Clients include Intel Corporation, Barrow Neurological Institute, CBS Local, Rodale (Men’s Health), CBRE, Talking Stick Resort, N1 Health in Scottsdale, CyraCom International, Inc, Savage Universal Corporation, CASS (Central Arizona Shelter Services), and RIESTER Advertising Agency. DMP provides scriptwriting, production services and video marketing and contracts with outside professionals in particular specialties, depending on the scope of the production. DMP is client-focused and designs the video programs to meet the needs of the client.
name: Joseph Forte Jr
